title: Strictly Come Dancing: the launch show – live
summary: The ballroom blockbuster is returning in 2025 with 15 new celebrity contestants. Fans are eagerly anticipating the pairing of these stars with professional dancers. Excitement builds over whose dance moves will impress and whose will struggle.

title: Manchester United 2-1 Chelsea: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Ruben Amorim secured a significant victory at Old Trafford amidst challenging weather and a vibrant atmosphere. The match was closely observed by Scott Murray, highlighting the intensity of the evening. The win adds a notable achievement to Amorim's coaching career.

title: Manchester United hold off 10-man Chelsea after Casemiro red offers hope
summary: Chelsea suffered a setback when Robert Sánchez was quickly dismissed during their match against Manchester United. Despite Casemiro scoring and later receiving a red card, Manchester United managed to secure a 2-1 victory. The match highlighted the impact of key player dismissals on the game's outcome.

title: Set pieces and squad depth: Arsenal aim to maintain edge over Manchester City
summary: Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta emphasizes the need for his team to enhance their performance after Champions League matches. The upcoming game poses a reunion with his former mentor. Improving their record in these fixtures is crucial for the team's progress.

title: Heathrow flights delayed and cancelled as cyber-attack hits European airports
summary: An attack has raised significant concerns regarding security at major airports, particularly in Brussels and Berlin, as their check-in and boarding systems were impacted. This incident highlights vulnerabilities in airport infrastructure and emphasizes the need for improved safety measures. Authorities are likely to investigate the breach and enhance protective protocols moving forward.
